trans-unit.source: Specifies the available verbosity levels of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger" /> 的可用詳細等級。

trans-unit.source: The descriptions of verbosity levels are only guidelines to how a typical logger (including the default [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] console logger) logs build events.
trans-unit.target: 是唯一的指導方針，以詳細資訊層級的說明如何一般記錄器 (包括預設[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]主控台記錄器) 記錄建置事件。

trans-unit.source: Loggers are free to interpret verbosity levels in any way they want.
trans-unit.target: 記錄器可以用來解譯任何他們想要的方式的詳細資訊層級。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。

trans-unit.source: Detailed verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> values of <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.Normal" />, all status events, and a build summary.
trans-unit.target: 詳細等級，顯示錯誤、警告、<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> 值為 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.Normal" /> 的訊息、所有狀態事件，以及建置摘要。

trans-unit.source: Diagnostic verbosity, which displays all errors, warnings, messages, status events, and a build summary.
trans-unit.target: 診斷詳細等級，顯示所有錯誤、警告、訊息、狀態事件，以及建置摘要。

trans-unit.source: Minimal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> values of <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" />, and a build summary.
trans-unit.target: 最小詳細等級，顯示錯誤、警告、<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> 值為 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" /> 的訊息，以及建置摘要。

trans-unit.source: Normal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> values of <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" />, some status events, and a build summary.
trans-unit.target: 一般詳細等級，顯示錯誤、警告、<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance" /> 值為 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High" /> 的訊息、部分狀態事件，以及建置摘要。

trans-unit.source: Quiet verbosity, which displays a build summary.
trans-unit.target: 無訊息詳細等級，顯示建置摘要。
